memories.content: Yesterday, I talked to Alex about his new hobby, he's really into pottery now.
Last week, Alex mentioned his favorite type of pizza is pepperoni with extra cheese from 'Pizza Palace'.
I saw Alex at the park on Sunday, he was walking his dog, Buster.

expected_response: Alex's favorite pizza is pepperoni with extra cheese from 'Pizza Palace'. (From memory: 'Last week, Alex mentioned his favorite type of pizza is pepperoni with extra cheese from 'Pizza Palace'.')
